channel.title: Linux on Sakamoto Kurome
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Sakamoto Kurome

item.title: Ubuntu
item.description: 友邦拓 乌班图 During the first ten years of this HOWTO’s life, I reported that from a new user’s point of view, all Linux distributions are almost equivalent. But in 2006-2007, an actual best choice emerged: Ubuntu. While other distros have their own areas of strength, Ubuntu is far and away the most accessible to Linux newbies. Beware, though, of the hideous and nigh-unusable “Unity” desktop interface

item.title: Git
item.description: Workspace：工作区，Index / Stage：暂存区，Repository：仓库区（或本地仓库），Remote：远程仓库 远程仓库 安装，
